channel.title: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?
channel.description: How do i make a command like, ::ipban username? Because I get spammers a lot and I need to have a quick command that will immediately ban their ip address. Also, when my staff do ::kick username, it just logs the person in and out real quick and I want ::kick to kick them from the server for atleast 5 minutes.

item.title: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?

@needhoster wrote:

wow thats a good quality video!

item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

here’s a video of what keeps showing up, it says something about certain stuff missing and to put ; in certain places and I don’t know why. This hasn’t been happening before, just ever since I changed the kick command

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?

item.title: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

if (command.startsWith("kick") && playerRights == 1) { client noob = null; for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){ if(server.playerHandler.players != null){ if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players.playerName)){ noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players; noob.disconnected = true; noob.logoutButton = true; }

Wrong. ‘players’ is an array, and the elements in the array are not being referenced; thus, no player kicked – and server.playerHandler.players.playerName will return null.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?

item.title: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

[quote=“Owner Spyder, post:8, topic:270045”]if (command.startsWith(“kick”) && playerRights == 1) {
client noob = null;
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){
if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)){
noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i];
noob.disconnected = true;
noob.logoutButton = true;
}[/quote]
But how do I keep them off for like 5 minutes?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 29, 2009, 02:35:01 pm[/size][hr]I put that command in and this is what came up for some reason

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?

item.title: How do i make an ip ban and kick command?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Spyder Owner Spyder
item.description:
@Owner_Spyder wrote:

if (command.startsWith(“kick”) && playerRights == 1) {
client noob = null;
for(int i = 0; i < server.playerHandler.players.length; i++){
if(server.playerHandler.players[i] != null){
if(command.substring(5).equalsIgnoreCase(server.playerHandler.players[i].playerName)){
noob = (client)server.playerHandler.players[i];
noob.disconnected = true;
noob.logoutButton = true;
}

Read full topic
